sub_title: Business Incubator Developer, Consultant Economic Development, Developer/Trainer Entrepreneurship training
summary:
I'm an enthusiastic entrepreneur since I was 14 years with my first company in Garden design & maintenance. Since then I've had companies in Architecture, Management Consultancy, Interim-Management, Training and Investment. You could say I have a pioneering mind and act accordingly. I'm or have been involved in many initiatives (ngo and commercial) in The Netherlands, Europe, Asia and Africa. These are diverse, but share one common objective: they are all initiated to enable entrepreneurship and socioeconomic development.

REFERENCES

Business Incubator Development

2000 - Development BViT cluster-incubator Delft (open-source focus) >> after 2006 merged in YES!Delft Incubator
2003 - Development of Caballerofabriek: re-development of a 13.000 m2 old cigarette factory into an 'Innovation Factory' where a university Centre of Entrepreneurship, BViT cluster incubator and a FabLab are combined in a campus style multi-tenant building.
2007 - Development of ESA BIC Noordwijk, High-tech incubator in cooperation with ESA, TNO, NSO, Rabobank. 

Development Expertise

Ministry of Education & Science: Action plan Entrepreneurship Education 2004. Higher Education law 2006.
Ministry of Economics & Innovation: New policy framework 'Technopartner' for High-Tech start-ups, valorisation programs by Universities and pre-seed capital funds.
Development Agency Rotterdam: Expertise for development of a Clean Tech incubator and accelerator.
Development Agency North-Holland North: Expertise on developing Maritime Campus Netherlands
Development Agency Airport Lelystad-Almere: Expertise on developing an area for sustainable pioneers.
Private University & City of Weert: feasibility of a student incubator
University of Delft: Design and Subsidy (SKE) for YES!Delft Incubator.
University of The Hague: Design and Subsidy (SIT) for incubator. Design and Subsidy (ANSWER) for student incubator Zoetermeer. Expertise for Entrepreneurship College. Design & Subsidy Centre for Entrepreneurship ECCEED.

Specialties: I like to share my experience to help improve the ecosystem for pioneers! 
Design & feasibility of Business Incubators, Developer 'Innovatiefabriek' , Expert Economic Development Policies, Education & Training Entrepreneurship
